/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the cityscape. The street, teeming with life, stretches out below, flanked by towering buildings and lush green trees. The sky above is a clear blue, adding a serene backdrop to the urban scene. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the city. The image is taken from a low angle, which enhances the grandeur of the buildings and the vastness of the sky. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky and the gray of the buildings. The perspective of the image gives a sense of depth and scale, immersing the viewer in the heart of Beijing.
